title: Unexpected Volume Control Issue with Reels
text:
As an avid user of your platform, I've encountered a persistent and vexing issue that I feel compelled to bring to your attention. I've noticed that whenever I preemptively lower my phone's volume to avoid the jarring experience of a loud/annoying reel, the Instagram app appears to override my settings by automatically increasing the volume whenever a reel is played. This not only disrupts my user experience but also causes considerable inconvenience as I scramble to adjust the volume back to a comfortable level.

This bug, or perhaps an unintended feature, consistently manifests each time I engage with Reels, leading to an erratic and unsatisfactory experience. As someone who enjoys browsing content on Instagram, it's disheartening to see such a fundamental aspect of user control being overlooked.

I believe that an app of Instagram's caliber should empower its users with full control over their device settings, including audio preferences. Reels should respect the volume levels set by the user, rather than altering them without consent. This would not only enhance the user experience but also adhere to the expected behavior of respecting individual preferences.

I urge the development team to address this issue with urgency. By doing so, you will not only rectify a significant flaw but also reinforce the trust and satisfaction of your user base. Thank you for considering this feedback, and I look forward to a resolution that allows for a more enjoyable and controlled browsing experience.

title: Chaotic App
text: I used to love insta. It used to be my escape from daily life a place where I relax see interesting stuff across the globe and distract myself. however lately it became very chaotic, I felt instead of relaxing it jammed my mind. First I keep getting in my home page feeds of people I don‚Äôt follow, I keep getting suggested pages even though I listed that I don‚Äôt want to see suggested pages in addition to sponsored one! Before I used to have in the explore section the option to see feeds of accounts I don‚Äôt follow which gave me an option. Now I have it on my home section without permission! If I watch a news on earthquakes I keep getting all days feeds on earthquakes which makes the person anxious. Big difference between reading a news about something then being exposed to everything about that topic that it makes u become alert and tense about it. It reminded me of obsessive behaviors. It‚Äôs too chaotic, too distracting and at a time it makes me tense instead of at ease. to be honest it made not like insta like b4.
